rows.label: tlk70000006_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I tried racing with a trotting Armu. To
make it harder, I looked over my
shoulder at the same time.

rows.label: tlk70000006_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Thing is, the Armus don't even really
understand the idea of competition.
They just love me as their master.

rows.label: tlk70000006_01_msg0004
rows.name:
So, as a game, it didn't really work out.
I'll have to try and think up something
else that's better for an Armu.

rows.label: tlk70000006_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Some of my mates are thinking up fun
Armu-games too. So, I'm going to try
something new each day, I reckon.

rows.label: tlk70000006_01_msg0006
rows.name:
I mean, it's more fun if you change
things up a bit, right?

rows.label: tlk70000006_01_msg0007
rows.name:
If I don't make it fun, I'll probably die
of boredom looking after these Armus
everyday...
